name: 黃士嘉
objective:
Digitial TV and design course consists of the following topics:
1. Introduction to DTV basics
2. Video coding concepts
3. MPEG-4, H.264
4. Error Control
schedule:
1. Introduction to DTV basics (4 weeks)
2. Video coding concepts (4 weeks)
3. MPEG-4, H.264 (4 weeks)
4. Error Control (4 weeks)
materials:
1. http://www.cc.ntut.edu.tw/~schuang/DTV/DTV.htm
2. H.264 and MPEG-4 Video Compression Video Coding for Nex generation Multimedia, Iain E. G. Richardson The Robert Gordon University, Aberdeen, UK
3. Digital Image Processing, Gonzalez, and woods
